title: Generate ensemble filenames — ensemble.filename
code: ensemble.filename(   settings,   prefix = "ensemble.samples",   suffix = "Rdata",   all.var.yr = TRUE,   ensemble.id = settings$ensemble$ensemble.id,   variable = settings$ensemble$variable,   start.year = settings$ensemble$start.year,   end.year = settings$ensemble$end.year )

title: Generate ensemble filenames — ensemble.filename
text: settings list PEcAn settings. prefix string appear beginning filename suffix file extension: string appear end filename .var.yr logical: ensemble include vars years? FALSE, filename include years vars ensemble.id ensemble ID(s) variable variable(s) included ensemble. start.year, end.year first last year simulated.

title: Generate ensemble filenames — ensemble.filename
text: vector filenames, form   `[settings$outdir]/[prefix].[ensemble.ID].[variable].[start.year].[end.year][suffix]`.

title: Generate ensemble filenames — ensemble.filename
text: Typically used passing settings object,   values can overridden manual use. single variable subset years needed,   generated filename identify form vars years included, set `.yr.var` TRUE   get filename form `prefix.ensemble_id.suffix`. elements recycled vectorwise.

what: Generate joint ensemble design for parameter sampling Creates a joint ensemble design that maintains parameter correlations across all sites in a multi-site run. This function generates sample indices that are shared across sites to ensure consistent parameter sampling. — generate_joint_ensemble_design
title: Generate joint ensemble design for parameter sampling Creates a joint ensemble design that maintains parameter correlations across all sites in a multi-site run. This function generates sample indices that are shared across sites to ensure consistent parameter sampling. — generate_joint_ensemble_design

title: Get Ensemble Samples — get.ensemble.samples

title: Get Ensemble Samples — get.ensemble.samples
code: get.ensemble.samples(   ensemble.size,   pft.samples,   env.samples,   method = "random",   param.names = NULL,   ... )

title: Get Ensemble Samples — get.ensemble.samples
text: ensemble.size number runs model ensemble pft.samples random samples parameter distribution, e.g. MCMC chain env.samples env samples method method used generate ensemble samples. Random generators: uniform, uniform latin hypercube permutation. Quasi-random generators: halton, sobol, torus. Random generation draws random variates whereas quasi-random generation deterministic well equidistributed. Default uniform. small ensemble size relatively large parameter number (e.g ensemble size < 5 # traits > 5) use methods halton. param.names list parameter names fitted either MA PDA, important argument, NULL parameters resampled independently ... arguments passed sampling method

title: Get Ensemble Samples — get.ensemble.samples

title: Get Ensemble Samples — get.ensemble.samples

title: Write ensemble config files — write.ensemble.configs
text: Writes config files use meta-analysis returns list run ids. Given pft.xml object, list lists supplied get.sa.samples, name distinguish output files, directory place files.

title: Write ensemble config files — write.ensemble.configs
code: write.ensemble.configs(   input_design,   ensemble.size,   defaults,   ensemble.samples,   settings,   model,   clean = FALSE,   write.to.db = TRUE,   restart = NULL,   samples = NULL,   rename = FALSE )

title: Write ensemble config files — write.ensemble.configs
text: input_design input indices samples ensemble.size size ensemble defaults pft ensemble.samples list lists supplied get.ensemble.samples settings list PEcAn settings model name model run, e.g. "ED2" "SIPNET" clean remove old output first? write..db logical: Record run BETY? restart case continuation old simulation. restart needs list name tags runid, inputs, new.params (parameters), new.state (initial condition), ensemble.id (ensemble id), start.time stop.time.See Details. samples Sampled inputs met parameter files rename Decide want rename previous output files, example convert sipnet.sipnet.2020-07-16..

title: Write ensemble config files — write.ensemble.configs
text: list, containing $runs = data frame runids, $ensemble.id = ensemble ID runs $samples ids samples used tag.  Also writes sensitivity analysis configuration files side effect

title: Write ensemble config files — write.ensemble.configs
text: restart functionality developed using model specific functions calling write_restart.modelname function. First, need make sure function already exist desired model.See https://pecanproject.github.io/pecan-documentation/latest/pecan-models.html new state dataframe different column state variable. number rows dataframe needs ensemble size. state variables can use setting initial conditions model specific. Check documentation write_restart.<modelname> function model using. units state variables need PEcAn standard units can found standard_vars. new.params also similar structure ensemble.samples sent argument.

title: Write ensemble config files — write.ensemble.configs
text: David LeBauer, Carl Davidson, Hamze Dokoohaki

what: Write sensitivity analysis config files — write.sa.configs

title: Write sensitivity analysis config files — write.sa.configs
code: write.sa.configs(   defaults,   quantile.samples,   settings,   model,   clean = FALSE,   write.to.db = TRUE )

title: Write sensitivity analysis config files — write.sa.configs
text: defaults named list default parameter values quantile.samples list lists supplied get.sa.samples settings list settings model name model run clean logical: Delete existing contents directory specified settings$rundir writing ? write..db logical: Record run BETY? TRUE, uses connection settings specified settings$database

title: Write sensitivity analysis config files — write.sa.configs
text: list, containing $runs = data frame runids,  $ensemble.id = ensemble ID runs.  Also writes sensitivity analysis configuration files side effect

title: Write sensitivity analysis config files — write.sa.configs
text: David LeBauer, Carl Davidson

title: PEcAn.uncertainty 1.8.2
text: Plotting sensitivity now makes less noise console produces one-page PDF intended. write.ensemble.configs write.sa.configs now generate ensemble id one provided DB-free run. Runs DB continue always generate new id. Note multi-site runs id provided now get separate ensemble ID (thus generate separate analyses) site. Documented runModule.run.sensitivity.analysis yet work multisite settings. fixed future release.

title: PEcAn.uncertainty 1.8.1
text: write.ensemble.configs now respects argument write..db settingsdatabasedatabasebetywriteisNULL(butifsettingswrite NULL   (settingsdatabasebetybetywrite set, still overrides write..db). Roxygen fixes

title: PEcAn.uncertainty 1.8.0
text: Added optional pfts argument run.sensitivity.analysis() sensitivity analysis variance decomposition can run subset PFTs defined settings desired (#3155).

title: PEcAn.uncertainty 1.7.2
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
